source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SEQ_00<tab>Cid is ready to discuss your foray into the Sigmascape.
target: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SEQ_00<tab>次元の狭間のシドは、準備万端のようだ。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SEQ_01Cid holds a brief strategy meeting prior to your first foray into the Sigmascape. Without a reference point within the test world, however, he reluctantly admits that he has nothing to share on the nature of the opponents you might face. Your only option is to go in blind. As before, Alpha will transfer his existential authorization to you just as soon as you have stepped into the unknown...

※In the event that you leave the Interdimensional Rift, you may re-enter by speaking with the Ironworks hand at the Yawn.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SEQ_01シドたちと作戦会議をし、ひとまず被検世界シグマの攻略を開始することになった。次元の狭間の「アルファ」と話そう。
一度外に出た場合は、ヤーンの大穴にいる「ガーロンド社の調査員」が、次元の狭間へ案内してくれるようだ。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SEQ_02Alpha stands ready to enter the Sigmascape with you. With no way of knowing what lurks within, you can but check your gear and endeavor to be adaptable.

※Sigmascape V1.0 can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SEQ_02アルファと話した。しっかりと準備を整えて、被検世界シグマに乗りこみ、待ち受けるシグマIを撃破しよう！

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SEQ_03<tab>To the bemusement of all concerned, your arrival in the Sigmascape is greeted by a homicidal train...or perhaps the ghost of one. Despite the somewhat unusual nature of your opponent, you set about your task in earnest, and eventually succeed in derailing its murderous ambitions.
target: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SEQ_03<tab>シグマI、魔列車を撃破した。次元の狭間の調査拠点に帰還しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SEQ_04<tab>You have returned to your base of operations in the rift. Speak with Cid, and discuss the aftermath of your phantom encounter.
target: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SEQ_04<tab>調査拠点に帰還した。次元の狭間の「シド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SEQ_05<tab>Cid welcomes you back, full of praise for your adaptability in battle. While pleased that you now have a solid point of reference within the Sigmascape, he is nonetheless unable to say with any certainty if the test world is the recreation of a distant realm or a work of pure fiction.
target: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SEQ_05<tab>シドから初戦の勝利を労われた。被検世界シグマについては、シドたちも出典を特定できないようだ。それは知る由もない世界、あるいはまだ見ぬ物語における、闘いの記録なのかもしれない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_TODO_01<tab>Use the Duty Finder to enter Sigmascape V1.0.
target: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_TODO_01<tab>「次元の狭間オメガ：シグマ編1」を攻略

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_TODO_02<tab>Use the Duty Finder to enter Sigmascape V1.0.
target: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_TODO_02<tab>「次元の狭間オメガ：シグマ編1」を攻略

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_NERO_000_000<tab>The “Sigmascape,” eh? I shall set to work analyzing the unspeakable horrors within.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_NERO_000_000さて……準備はこンなもんかね。
さっそく被検世界「シグマ」とやらの攻略をはじめようぜ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_010<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Will you be descending into the Yawn?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_010「次元の狭間」での戦い、おつかれさまです！
大穴の中に降りますか？
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>「次元の狭間」に移動しますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_020<tab>Before you cross the threshold, we should take a moment to discuss where we stand.
target: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_020<tab>突入前に、簡単な確認だけしておこう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_021<tab><var 1A 02 /var>That<var 1A 01 /var> is the test world you need to conquer. The Sigmascape.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_021あれが、今回挑むことになる世界……
被検世界「シグマ」だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_NERO_000_022<tab>Is that a mask...or a face? The castle was certainly a surprise, but this is verging on disturbing!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_NERO_000_022映ってるのは……顔か？
前回の城も摩訶不思議だったが……
また輪をかけてアヤシイな！

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_023<tab>And we currently have no idea what it might signify. My first instinct is to dive straight into our analysis.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_023今のところは、あれが何を意味するかサッパリだ。
これから、急いで「シグマ」の解析をはじめようと思う。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_024<tab>...The problem being that without a reference point from within the Sigmascape to start from, we'll have no way of knowing if we're even analyzing the correct data.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_024……が、とかく最初は、戦いをはじめてみないと、
正しい情報に届いているのかすら、判断がつかないからな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_025<tab>Which means you'll just have to go in blind. Hardly the best way to enter into a fight, but needs must and all that. Are you up for the challenge?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_025こんな重要な戦いに、
前情報なしで送り出すのは気が引けるが……
頼めるか、)) (( )) 02 /var>。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_026<tab>Can I ask you to join <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, Alpha? We seem to be fine out here, but <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> will need your authorization if <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>'s to do battle inside the test world.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_026それじゃ、アルファも一緒に頼むぞ。
被検世界の中では、また、
お前の持っている戦闘への参加権を借りなきゃならないからな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_NERO_000_027<tab>Keep your wits about you, savior. Your next opponent could be almost <var 1A 02 /var>anything<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_NERO_000_027ククク……！
最初はどんな相手かねぇ。
せいぜい楽しもうぜ、英雄殿？

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_030<tab>Say the word to Alpha when you're ready. Again, I wish I had more to tell you, but I'm sure you'll manage somehow. You always do.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_030準備が整ったら、アルファに声をかけてくれ。
情報が皆無ですまないが……どうか無事で。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_NERO_000_035<tab>Ahhh... Strange technology...the ever-present threat of death... I have never felt so in my element!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_NERO_000_035さあさあ、オレたちも楽しい仕事の時間だぜ！
どんな難題が相手だか、胸が躍るなぁ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Alpha appears eager to proceed. You may enter Sigmascape V1.0 whenever you are ready.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_SYSTEM_000_041アルファも、気合十分のようだ！
被検世界「シグマ」第一層へ、ともに突入しよう。

TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_MINA_000_060遠い世界の あなた
ドマをありがとう――

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_NERO_000_070<tab>Ahahaha! The glorious absurdity of it all! Even you must have managed a smile. One wonders what Omega has in store for you next. A delinquent rowing boat, perhaps? Or an angry cable car?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_NERO_000_070アッハッハ！
ハナから大した相手だったなぁ！
なかなか見応えのある絵面だったぜ、英雄殿？
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_ALPHA_000_075<tab>クエックエッ……クエックエッ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_080<tab>Thank the gods you're fast on your feet. When I first saw you'd be facing a train of all things, I assumed I was hallucinating.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_080はぁ……無事で何よりだ。
間違ったデータを開いたんじゃないかと焦ったが……
本当に列車が相手とは……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_081<tab>But with that oddness behind us, we can be fully certain we have the right set of data for the Sigmascape.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_081だが、おかげでこれからは、
シグマ世界のデータを、正しく引っ張りだしてこられそうだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_082<tab>From what we've been able to determine, this is a recreation of a devastated world.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_082現状わかった範囲だと……そうだな……
これは、一度崩壊を迎えた、ある世界の再現らしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_083<tab>Unfortunately, we have not found any clues as to its origin. We came across several familiar terms─“Doma” included─but the arc of history is inconsistent with our own.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_083生憎と、俺もネロも出典に心当たりがなくてな……。
「ドマ」をはじめ、いくつか知ったキーワードは拾えたが、
どうにも俺たちの知る歴史とは一致しない……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_084<tab>Given that Omega draws from realms which could be fictional or even other-dimensional, we can only guess at the source upon which the Sigmascape is based. But if it <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> fictional, it seems safe to assume that the author had a bad experience with a train.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR202_03032_CID_000_084オメガが、物語や別世界の歴史からも再現を行えるなら、
シグマ世界はどこか遠い……
俺たちでは知る由もない、闘いの記録なのかもしれないな。
